extendedInfo.description: You will need a compatible launcher that supports custom icon packs. Compatible with Apex Launcher, Nova Launcher, ADW Launcher, and Holo Launcher. Note that this is not a standalone app.For other launchers, get Desktop Visualizer to apply icons on the homescreen: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.bii.android.app.dskvzr(more details below)*To use this icon pack:*First install Apex / Nova / ADW / Holo Launcher (all free from the Play Store). Then proceed to download and install this icon pack.Find Simply 8-Bit in the launcher's theme settings, then click apply.Manual selection of icons / Icon picker is only supported on Apex and Nova.Features:480+ icons and counting! HTC app icons in 8-bit!Samsung app icons in 8-bit!8-bit themed wallpapers!Extra 8-bit custom icons for compatible launcher!Optimized for XHDPI (720p) devices!Go to http://simplyeightbit.tumblr.com/ for more details!To apply custom icons:Apex Launcher and Nova Launcher Prime: Long press and release icon shortcut that is already placed on homescreen > Press Edit > Press on the app icon > Select (from) Icon Pack > Select Simply 8-Bit > Choose the icon you want.Desktop Visualizer: at the DVR setup screen > Press Select Icon > Select Others > Select Simply 8-Bit > Choose the icon. (Custom icons are located at the end of the list)To apply the wallpapers you'll need Apex Launcher installed, otherwise get them from http://bit.ly/Simply8BitWallpapersI take icon requests, so if you have an app icon to be themed, please feel free to make the request by filling up this form! http://bit.ly/Simply8BitRequestIf you have any questions/comments/concerns/ideas then please contact me via j3nnning@gmail.comif you like my work, please consider purchasing the donate version!Don't forget to rate and please leave a review!

reviews.title: Nice but more Icons needed.
reviews.comment: Really clever and cute, but needs many many many more app icons to give my phone a more uniform and truly stylized appearance.
reviews.author: Centerfold Skye

reviews.title: Excellent but...
reviews.comment: You covered all the normal android apps but there isn\'t one for the stock calculator. Please add it in the next update.

reviews.comment: more legend of zelda is muchly needed....

reviews.comment: Best icon pack ever!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: Lacks continuity
reviews.comment: If you want to make an 8-bit icon pack, stick to one pixel size. An example of what I am talking about is with the Google drive and Google keep apps, drive has big, chunky blocks and keep has dainty little squares, they just look out of place next to one another.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Please add in play games and nova launcher. Thanks :D

reviews.title: Awesome but...
